subject: Gliders, Hang Gliding and Paragliding
Aviation Accidents and Safety
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Two hang gliders, Jonny Durand and Dustin Martin, raced in tight pursuit of the most prized feat in the high adrenaline sport: farthest ever flown.
snippet: Two hang gliders, Jonny Durand and Dustin Martin, raced in tight pursuit of the most prized feat in the high adrenaline sport: farthest ever flown.
